subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: St. Francis of Brooklyn, which has not even made the N.I.T. since 1963, cut a 10-point second-half deficit to 3 in the waning seconds, but Robert Morris secured the NEC tournament title.
snippet: St. Francis of Brooklyn, which has not even made the N.I.T. since 1963, cut a 10-point second-half deficit to 3 in the waning seconds, but Robert Morris secured the NEC tournament title.
